content.p: Catering Services frequently recruit to posts for our numerous cafes, halls of residence and bars. We regularly advertise a range of jobs on a variety of different hours and days with excellent rates of pay and pleasant working surroundings We offer a wide range of roles across halls management, catering, cleaning, bars and retail. Hours vary from 10 to 36.25 a week Contracts are offered on either 34, 36, 38 or 39 weeks of the year. Pay is equated over the 12 month period ensuring you get paid monthly throughout the year Casual roles are great for students who need flexibility through exam and study periods and want to earn at other times. Students are able to work up to 20 hours per week during term time How to join our casual team Apply directly by email to one of our operations managers and they will arrange for you to be added to our casuals list University Park Halls & Catering Zuzana Khan zuzana.khan@nottingham.ac.uk Retail Angela Robinson angela.robinson@nottingham.ac.uk Bars Kirsty Proctor kirsty.proctor@nottingham.ac.uk Jubilee Campus Retail/Halls/Conferencing Bob Crossley robert.crossley@nottingham.ac.uk The Cottage, Welcome Point Central University of Nottingham, University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RJ
